name: 001 (America) 2011-2021
description: Classic video game imagery with every pixel replaced by a QR code. Each of the 1,521 codes links to a selected tweet. The tweets embedded inside each video game character share one key word, the undisclosed title of that character. Created in 2011, the work was left for 10 years to allow the links to degrade, slowly altering the nature, interactivity and meaning of the piece. Exhibited at TedXLondon, 2011. (MDKtm.com/nft) 11811 X 8268 pixels / 446 KB / Bitmap PNG
